remarks: Invert ratios of positive numbers and swap their ordering. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
rpred.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
rpaddcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ledivdivd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR+ ) $.
ledivdivd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A / B ) <_ ( C / D ) ) $.
ledivdivd $p |- ( ph -> ( D / C ) <_ ( B / A ) ) $.
